name: Espansr Quick Help
description: Quick reference for espansr CLI commands.
content:
espansr commands:
  list       — show templates with triggers
  sync       — sync to Espanso
  status     — show config paths
  validate   — check for errors
  import     — import templates
  gui        — launch editor

Config: ~/.config/espansr/
Sync:   espansr sync
